name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ぺこーら24SpecialLive】3D LIVE!!!! 最後は歌って踊って盛り上がるぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [1J1JG99KKCk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "Happiness" by Hololive Gen 3 (Pekora, Marine, Rushia, Flare, Noel). The members finish the song and strike a final pose.
MC segment where Usada Pekora announces her 4th-anniversary commemorative goods to the audience.

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah...
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah...

subtitles.original: みんな、みんな、まだ！まだ終わってねえぺこだよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, everyone, not yet! It's not over yet, peko!

subtitles.original: ちょっとここから、ぺこらのお知らせタイム！
subtitles.english: From here, it's Pekora's announcement time!

subtitles.original: まあ多分、気づいてる人もいるとは思いますぺこですけども、
subtitles.english: Well, I think some people might have noticed, peko,

subtitles.original: まあぺこらも4周年となったので、
subtitles.english: since Pekora has reached her 4th anniversary,

subtitles.original: 今回も出ますよ！4周年記念グッズ！
subtitles.english: This time too, they're coming out! 4th Anniversary Commemorative Goods!

subtitles.original: 紹介していきたいと思うぺこです！
subtitles.english: I'd like to introduce them, peko!

subtitles.original: うさだぺこら活動4周年記念グッズのこちらでございます！
subtitles.english: These are the Usada Pekora 4th Anniversary Commemorative Goods!

subtitles.original: 1つ目はこちら！トゥルルン！
subtitles.english: The first one is this! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: ラバーマット！
subtitles.english: Rubber Mat!

subtitles.original: こちらですね、なんと、
subtitles.english: This one, would you believe it,

subtitles.original: はぐれママ描き下ろしのラバーマットとなっております！
subtitles.english: is a rubber mat with a new illustration by Hagure-mama!

subtitles.original: うさだぺこらの色んな衣装が書いてあって可愛いぺこですよね！ぜひ使ってくださいぺこ！
subtitles.english: It features Usada Pekora in various outfits, so it's very cute, peko! Please use it, peko!

subtitles.original: ぺこらと一緒に、お揃いにしてもらえたらなと思うぺこ！
subtitles.english: I hope you can get one to match with Pekora, peko!

subtitles.original: そして続いてはこちら！トゥルルン！
subtitles.english: And moving on, the next one is this! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: さかきやひろ先生描き下ろしの、アクリルスタンド！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: An acrylic stand with a new illustration by Sakaki Yahiro-sensei! Yay!

subtitles.original: 今までさ、ぺこら多分だけど、
subtitles.english: Up until now, Pekora thinks, anyway,

subtitles.original: まあ公式とかのアクリルとかはあったけど、
subtitles.english: there were official acrylics and stuff,

subtitles.original: 新3Dの衣装のアクリルスタンドは初めて出すぺこですので、
subtitles.english: but this is the first time I'm releasing an acrylic stand in the new 3D outfit, peko.

subtitles.original: 今回が初ぺこですよ！しかも、普通のアクリルスタンドじゃない！
subtitles.english: So this is a first, peko! What's more, it's not just an ordinary acrylic stand!

subtitles.original: ホログラム加工付きのキラキラしたアクリルスタンドぺこですので、
subtitles.english: It's a sparkly acrylic stand with a hologram finish, peko.

subtitles.original: ぜひお部屋に1個置いてもいいのかなと思いますので、よろしくお願いしますぺこ！
subtitles.english: So I think it would be nice to have one in your room. Please check it out, peko!

subtitles.original: 続いてはこちら！トゥルルン！
subtitles.english: Moving on, here's the next one! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: タンブラー！
subtitles.english: Tumbler!

subtitles.original: やっぱさ、配信には飲み物！
subtitles.english: After all, you need a drink for streaming!

subtitles.original: みんなのお供に1つタンブラー、必要ぺこかなと思いまして、
subtitles.english: I thought everyone might need a tumbler as a companion, peko.

subtitles.original: ぜひね、この可愛いタンブラーを持ってぺこらの配信に、
subtitles.english: So, by all means, please take this cute tumbler and come to Pekora's streams,

subtitles.original: これからもね、来ていただきたいということでタンブラー作ってみました！
subtitles.english: from now on as well! That's why I made this tumbler!

subtitles.original: そして最後はこちら！
subtitles.english: And finally, this one!

subtitles.original: うさだぺこらぬいぐるみ！
subtitles.english: Usada Pekora Plushie!

subtitles.original: 可愛くないぺこですか？
subtitles.english: Isn't it cute, peko?

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ可愛く作っていただいております！
subtitles.english: They've made it incredibly cute!

subtitles.original: まあね、結構もうね、ぬいぐるみとかは出てたりもするぺこですけど、
subtitles.english: Well, quite a few plushies have been released already, peko,

subtitles.original: ぺこらからちゃんと出すのは初めてなので、
subtitles.english: but this is the first time one is being officially released from Pekora herself,

subtitles.original: ぜひたくさんぬいぐるみいっぱい置いちゃってね、
subtitles.english: so please get lots of plushies and place them everywhere,

subtitles.original: 一緒にぺこらとともに過ごしてるんだっていう感じで、
subtitles.english: to feel like you're spending time together with Pekora.

subtitles.original: 思っていただきたいぺこですので、もう1個とは言わずたくさん、
subtitles.english: That's what I'd like you to feel, peko, so don't just stop at one, get many!

subtitles.original: 一緒にぺこちゃんと寝ていただけたらなとも思うし、
subtitles.english: I hope you can sleep together with Peko-chan,

subtitles.original: お部屋にね、飾るだけでもいいぺこだし、
subtitles.english: or just decorating your room with them is fine too, peko.

subtitles.original: あの旅行とかにも連れてってあげたりとか、
subtitles.english: You can also take them with you on trips and such.

subtitles.original: たくさん使い道があると思うぺこですので、
subtitles.english: There are many ways to enjoy them, peko.

subtitles.original: ぜひお手元によろしくお願いしますぺこ！
subtitles.english: So please do get your hands on one, peko!

subtitles.original: そしてこちら、フルセット特典がございます！
subtitles.english: And there's also a full set bonus!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、数量限定の特典には、
subtitles.english: For the limited edition bonus,

subtitles.original: ぺこら、また書きます！直筆サイン！
subtitles.english: Pekora will be writing them again! Hand-signed autographs!

subtitles.original: そして箔押しの複製メッセージ入り！
subtitles.english: And it includes a foil-stamped duplicated message!

subtitles.original: こちらははぐれ先生の描き下ろしポストカード！
subtitles.english: This is a postcard with a new illustration by Hagure-sensei!

subtitles.original: そして通常は箔押しの複製サインがあります！
subtitles.english: And the regular version has a foil-stamped duplicated signature!

subtitles.original: そして、このフルセットの特典ボイス！
subtitles.english: And, the bonus voice for this full set!

subtitles.original: ぺこらの気持ちを伝えたいボイス！
subtitles.english: A voice where I want to convey Pekora's feelings!

subtitles.original: なんなんだ？気になるよな！
subtitles.english: What is it? You're curious, right?

subtitles.original: ぺこらが何の気持ちを伝えたいのか、
subtitles.english: What kind of feelings Pekora wants to convey...

subtitles.original: 罵倒なのか、それとも感謝なのか、
subtitles.english: Whether it's verbal abuse, or perhaps gratitude,

subtitles.original: わからないぺこだけど、聞きたい人はぜひ！
subtitles.english: I don't know, peko, but if you want to hear it, by all means!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いしますぺこ！
subtitles.english: Please check it out, peko!

subtitles.original: ぺこらの思いを込めたぺこですので、
subtitles.english: It's filled with Pekora's thoughts, peko,

subtitles.original: まあこれを機に何かぺこらのことを知りたい、
subtitles.english: so if you want to take this opportunity to learn something about Pekora,

subtitles.original: 気持ちが分かりたい人はぜひ買っていただきたいなと、いうふうに思います！
subtitles.english: or if you want to understand my feelings, please do buy it, is what I'm thinking!

subtitles.original: 本当にね、可愛い4つのねグッズなので、ぜひとも、
subtitles.english: They're really four cute items, so please,

subtitles.original: お求めいただけたらなと思うぺこ！
subtitles.english: I hope you consider purchasing them, peko!

subtitles.original: グッズはこんな感じぺこですかね。
subtitles.english: I guess that's it for the goods, peko.

subtitles.original: そして本当に4周年、いやもう、
subtitles.english: And really, the 4th anniversary... no, wait,

subtitles.original: 次から5周年目？5年目か。5年目になるうさだぺこら。
subtitles.english: from now on it's the 5th anniversary? The 5th year. Usada Pekora entering her 5th year.

subtitles.original: ちょっと4周年はちょっと24時間という、
subtitles.english: For the 4th anniversary, I did a 24-hour stream,

subtitles.original: 今までにない試み、そして最後にはスペシャルライブという、
subtitles.english: an unprecedented challenge, followed by a special live at the end.

subtitles.original: いやもう、みんな眠くになってないぺこか？
subtitles.english: I mean, isn't everyone getting sleepy, peko?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？もうちょっとあるからね！
subtitles.english: Are you okay? There's still a little bit left!

subtitles.original: そしてこれからも5年目もね、一緒にぺこラストーリーを、
subtitles.english: And from now on, in the 5th year too, let's walk the Pekora story together,

subtitles.original: 歩んでいっていただけたらなと思うぺこ！
subtitles.english: I hope you'll continue to walk with me, peko!

subtitles.original: そしてこの後は、最後に4周年やって、4年やって、
subtitles.english: And after this, finally, having reached the 4th anniversary, having done this for 4 years...
